title: Konosuba × Rokudenashi Special Collaboration Book - Novel Updates
author: Akatsuki Natsume   Hitsuji Tarou   暁なつめ   羊太郎
description: This book is the special crossover between Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor and Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! series written commemorate the 30th anniversary of Fantasia Bunko and Dragon Magazine. It was released as the bonus book for Dragon Magazine May 2018 issue as compilation volume of total 64 pages.>
